snippet: While wealth managers have scrambled to keep up with new regulations from a global crackdown on bank secrecy, they also stand to benefit.
abstract: While wealth managers have scrambled to keep up with new regulations from a global crackdown on bank secrecy, they also stand to benefit.

headline.main: Tax Haven Crackdown Creates Opportunities for Bankers
headline.print_headline: Tax Haven Crackdown Creates Opportunities for Bankers
